channel.title: Cannot stop elite hacking client! :''(
channel.description: Hi, i'm not sure if this is in the right section. but anyway, There are players on my server using a elite hacking client that is not released to the public. but luckily one of the players have sent me the cheat client. I tried to stop it using the UID thing and that failed, I can see no other tutorial that can take this this on :( Please anybody help me. this thing is ruining my server!
